Authors: Ronald Petersen, Karen Hughes, Jay Justice
Title: Two new species of Ramaria from Arkansas
Keywords:
Ozark Plateau, dendrophysoid hyphae, Laeticolora,
taxonomy
Abstract:
Two species of Ramaria from the Ozark region of Arkansas,
USA, R. admiratia and R. calvodistalis, are proposed as new. They are
described morphologically and placed molecularly within a large clade
including taxa of ramarioid and cantharelloid fungi.

trees.title: Two new species of Ramaria, nrLSU
